title: Shared Drawing Canvas
description: This video puts all of the pieces together: node, express, p5.js, and socket.io to show how to program a shared, collaborative drawing canvas.  How to broadcast messages between clients and the server is covered.

timestamps.title: Recieving messages from the clients by the web server
Recieving messages from the server by the clients
Playing around with the shared drawing canvases!

codeExamples.title: Shared Drawing Canvas
codeExamples.description: Link to the code for creating a shared HTML5 canvas across multiple browser sessions.
